>
[Shapechanger's Intuition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2621) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

A lifetime of experience helps you see through disguises. When you come within 10 feet of a creature that is transformed into another form or is [Impersonating](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) a specific creature, the GM rolls a secret Perception check for you to realize that the creature is transformed, even if you didn't spend an action to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) against that creature.
name: Shapechanger's Intuition
